title: DuckDB: In-Process Python Analytics for Not-Quite-Big Data
author: Joab Jackson
description: An in-process analytics database, DuckDB can work with surprisingly large data sets without having to maintain a distributed multiserver system. Best of all? You can analyze data directly from your Python app.
cntitle: DuckDB：适用于非大数据的进程内 Python 分析
cndescription: DuckDB 是一款进程内分析数据库，它可以在无需维护分布式多服务器系统的情况下处理出人意料的大型数据集。最棒的是什么？您可以直接从 Python 应用程序分析数据。
